mapper.update:
update ls_admin
clinicid = #{clinicid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
doctorid = #{doctorid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
loginame = #{loginame,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loginpwd = #{loginpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
logintime = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
caller_nos = #{callerNos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transfer_no = #{transferNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
org_name = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
no_wx = #{noWx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
micro_userid = #{microUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where adminid = #{adminid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ls_admin set clinicid = #{clinicid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, doctorid = #{doctorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loginame = #{loginame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginpwd = #{loginpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, logintime = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, caller_nos = #{callerNos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transfer_no = #{transferNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_name = #{orgName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, no_wx = #{noWx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where adminid = #{adminid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT adminid,clinicid,doctorid,`name`,`status`,phone,ec_userid,micro_userid FROM ls_admin WHERE loginame=#{name} AND loginpwd=#{password} AND `status` >= 0
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ls_admin WHERE `status` >= 0 AND loginame=#{loginame}

SELECT
FROM ls_admin WHERE `name`=#{name} AND `status` >= 0 AND adminid IN(SELECT adminid FROM ls_admin_role WHERE roleid=3) LIMIT 1
SELECT adminid, loginame, name, phone FROM ls_admin order by logintime desc
SELECT adminid, loginame, name,loginpwd, phone FROM ls_admin where loginame=#{loginame}
select ec_userid from ls_admin where ec_userid is not null
